tests/auth.setup.js.description: Auth setup now uses test.use() for headless/viewport config, DEMO_APP_PATH constant, .first() on all selectors, .catch(() => false) for resilience, 'domcontentloaded' wait state (faster than networkidle), fallback login via Enter key, expanded skip modal selectors array, and final navigation verification for demo mode. Follows same patterns as cpu-standby-failover.spec.js.

tests/e2e-journeys/cpu-standby-failover..description: Contains 11 E2E tests in 3 suites: CPU Standby Failover (4 tests), Metrics (2 tests), Failover Report (5 tests). Tests use flexible Playwright patterns with .first(), .catch(() => false), and force clicks. Some tests have weak assertions that always pass.

tests/e2e-journeys/failover-complete-jou.description: Refactored to follow cpu-standby-failover.spec.js patterns: uses BASE_PATH='/demo-app', helper functions for navigation (goToMachines, goToSettings, goToFailoverReport, goToDashboard), test.use() for headless config, and consistent use of .first() and .catch(() => false) for resilient selectors.

tests/run-failover-tests.sh.description: Automated test runner script for all failover E2E tests. Checks dependencies, verifies frontend is running at localhost:5173, runs 3 test files (47 tests total) in sequence with USE_DEMO_MODE=true, and generates HTML report. Usage: chmod +x run-failover-tests.sh && ./run-failover-tests.sh
